faq.question: What's included in an executive summary?
faq.answer: Key findings, main recommendations, business implications, risks/opportunities, and action items - everything an executive needs to make decisions.

faq.question: How long are the executive summaries?
faq.answer: Typically 1 page (300-500 words), focused on high-level insights. You can request more or less detail as needed.

faq.question: Can I customize the summary format?
faq.answer: Yes! You can specify what to focus on: 'Focus on financial implications' or 'Highlight strategic risks' to get targeted summaries.

faq.question: Does it work with financial reports?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Works great with financial statements, earnings reports, market analysis, and other business documents.

faq.question: Can I share summaries with my team?
faq.answer: Yes! Export summaries as PDF or share links. Team plan includes collaborative workspaces for sharing insights.

faq.question: What plans support executive summaries?
faq.answer: All plans! Free: 5/month. Starter ($9/mo): 50/month. Pro ($19/mo): 200/month. Team ($49/mo): unlimited.
